name: Narayana Murthy B
company_address: Vaishnavi Cynosure, Gachibowli, Hyderabad, Telangana, 500032
my_business: Jedhru Informatics provides Payroll Outsourcing Services. Statutory Compliance, 3rd Party payroll, Employer Of Record(EOR) Service, Custodial and Lodgement Services.
top_product: Payroll Services, Employer Of Record(EOR) Service,
ideal_referral: Small and medium-sized IT and non-IT companies in India that are currently managing their payroll manually or in-house and are looking to streamline the process through a reliable payroll partner. Also, foreign companies especially startups, SMEs, consulting firms, and agencies—that want to hire employees in India without setting up a legal entity, and are looking for a trusted Employer of Record (EOR) partner.
top_problem_solved: Helped 1000+ employees client, with 5 branches across India, to streamline their payroll process and reduced amount of time they spend to 25% of what they spent earlier
my_favourite_bni_story: During one of the BNI International Socials, I was rooming with a fellow member who runs a small tech company. Over a casual chat, I noticed he was doing payroll himself—even while on vacation—just because his team was under 20 people. I asked him, “Why spend your valuable time and vacation on administrative work? And what happens to payroll if you're unavailable?” Then I offered a solution: outsource your payroll at 1/3 the cost of hiring a fresher, and free up your time for things that really matter. He passed me a referral. We onboarded his team, and today—years later—even after they’ve scaled to 800+ employees, we’re still managing their payroll. That’s the power of a meaningful conversation, and of BNI connections.

my_business: Bharat Charge is an EV charging company setting up smart AC and high-speed DC chargers nationwide. We help apartments, restaurants, offices, and developers offer seamless EV charging with end-to-end solutions—from site assessment and installation to operations and 24×7 support. Our mission is to build a reliable EV charging network that accelerates India’s shift to clean mobility.
top_product: Our top product is turnkey EV charging solutions—covering AC chargers, DC fast chargers, installation, software, and 24×7 operations.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is anyone who owns or manages property—apartments, restaurants, offices, gated communities, or commercial spaces—who wants to install EV charging.
top_problem_solved: We solve the biggest challenge in EV adoption—lack of convenient charging—by helping communities and businesses install smart, future-ready chargers.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story is when a simple introduction to a property owner turned into a full EV charging installation—showing how the right referral at the right time can accelerate both business and sustainability.
